changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE SAVED_LICENSE_SEQ START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1 NOCACHE;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE REJECTED_LICENSE_SEQ START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1 NOCACHE;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE OWNERSHIP_TYPES ( TYPE_CD VARCHAR2 (25) , TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2 (250) , CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , CREATED_BY NUMBER , UPDATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , UPDATED_BY NUMBER );

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE OWNERSHIP_TYPES ADD CONSTRAINT OWNERSHIP_TYPES_PK PRIMARY KEY (TYPE_CD) ;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE US_GOV_OWNERSHIP_TYPES ( USGOV_TYPE_CD VARCHAR2 (50) , USGOV_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2 (250) , CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , CREATED_BY NUMBER , UPDATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , UPDATED_BY NUMBER );

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE US_GOV_OWNERSHIP_TYPES ADD CONSTRAINT US_GOV_OWNERSHIP_TYPES_PK PRIMARY KEY (USGOV_TYPE_CD) ;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE SAVED_LICENSES ( LICENSE_ID NUMBER default SAVED_LICENSE_SEQ.nextval, USER_ID NUMBER , DH_ID NUMBER , LICENSE_OBJECT CLOB CONSTRAINT SAVED_LICENSES_CHK CHECK(LICENSE_OBJECT IS JSON) , CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , CREATED_BY NUMBER , UPDATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , UPDATED_BY NUMBER );

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE SAVED_LICENSES ADD CONSTRAINT SAVED_LICENSES_PK PRIMARY KEY (LICENSE_ID) ;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE LICENSE_REJECTION_REASONS ( REASON_CD VARCHAR2 (15) NOT NULL , REASON_TEXT VARCHAR2 (2500) , CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , CREATED_BY NUMBER , UPDATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , UPDATED_BY NUMBER );

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE LICENSE_REJECTION_REASONS ADD CONSTRAINT LICENSE_REJECTION_REASONS_PK PRIMARY KEY (REASON_CD) ;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE REJECTED_LICENSE_DETAILS ( REJECTED_ID NUMBER default REJECTED_LICENSE_SEQ.nextval, DH_ID NUMBER, REJECTION_REASON_CD VARCHAR2(15), CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , CREATED_BY NUMBER , UPDATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6) , UPDATED_BY NUMBER );

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE REJECTED_LICENSE_DETAILS ADD CONSTRAINT REJECTED_LICENSE_DETAILS_PK PRIMARY KEY (REJECTED_ID);

changeSet.sql: Create sequence license_upload_seq start with 1 nocache;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE LICENSE_UPLOAD_DETAILS ( UPLOAD_ID NUMBER default license_upload_seq.nextval, LICENSE_ID NUMBER , LICENSE_FILE BLOB , CREATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), CREATED_BY NUMBER , UPDATED_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), UPDATED_BY NUMBER );

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE LICENSE_UPLOAD_DETAILS ADD CONSTRAINT LICENSE_UPLOAD_DETAILS_PK PRIMARY KEY (UPLOAD_ID) ;

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
gphaniraj

changeSet.author: gphaniraj
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE SUB_OWNERSHIP_TYPES ADD CONSTRAINT SUB_OWNERSHIP_TYPES_PK PRIMARY KEY (SUB_TYPE_CD);
